com.github.astefanich.exchange

Class ExchangeNetworkProxy

  • Object
    • ExchangeNetworkProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StockExchange

    public final class ExchangeNetworkProxy
extends Object
implements StockExchange
    Client-side class for interacting with a network accessible StockExchange, which is accessed via a ExchangeNetworkAdapter. This class' methods perform the following steps:
    - Encodes the method request as a String (based on ProtocolConstants)
    - Sends the command to the ExchangeNetworkAdapter
    - Decodes the received response
    - Returns the result Object creation should come from ExchangeNetworkProxyFactory.
    Author:
    AndrewStefanich
    See Also:
    StockExchange, StockQuote, ProtocolConstants, ExchangeNetworkAdapter, EventProcessor
